title: Two Sum
problemStatement: Given an array of integers, return indices of the two numbers such that they add up to a specific target.
constraints: Each input would have exactly one solution, and you may not use the same element twice.

title: Add Two Numbers
problemStatement: You are given two non-empty linked lists representing two non-negative integers. Add the two numbers and return the sum as a linked list.
constraints: The number of nodes in each linked list is in the range [1, 100].
